document.docAuthor: Benayahu, Yehuda & Van Ofwegen, Leen P.
document.masterDocTitle: Octocorals (Cnidaria, Anthozoa) from Reunion, with a description of two new species of the genus Sinularia May, 1898 and notes on the occurrence of other species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Octocorals (Cnidaria, Anthozoa) from Reunion, with a description of two new species of the genus Sinularia May, 1898 and notes on the occurrence of other species

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Department of Zoology, George S. Wise Faculty of Life Sciences, Tel Aviv University, Ramat Aviv, 69978 (Israel) yehudab @ tauex. tau. ac. il

subSubSection.paragraph: MATERIAL EXAMINED. — ZMTAU Co 33857, l’Ermitage, 30 km from St-Denis ( 21°05.586’S , 55°13.239’E ), 15-20 m , XII.2006 , leg. M. Aknin. — ZMTAU Co 34433, Co 34438, Co 34441, Saint-Leu, Pointe au Sel ( 21°12’17.54”S , 55°16’48.90”E ), reef slope, 12-16 m , 9.IV.2008 . — ZM- TAU Co 35008 (2 colonies), Grande Ravine ( 21°07.922’S , 55°16.095’E ), reef slope, 16-20 m , 18.IV.2007 , leg. M. Aknin. — ZMTAU Co 34403 (2 colonies), Saint-Paul, Planch’ Alizés ( 21°05’58.61”S , 55°13’48.81”E ), reef slope, 14-19 m , 7.IV.2008 .— ZMTAU Co34463,Saint-Leu,Pointe des Châteaux ( 21°09’04.39”S , 55°16’12.47”E ), reef slope, 14-20 m , 10.IV.2008 . — ZMTAU Co 34369 (3 colonies), Saint-Paul, Pain de Sucre (Maharani) ( 21°01’22.33”S , 55°13’40.95”E ), reef slope, 6 m , 3.IV.2008 . — ZMTAU Co 34516, Co 34523, Co 34517, Passe de l’Ermitage ( 21°05.190’S , 55°13.239’E ), 17 m , 24.XI.2008 ,leg.M.Aknin.

MATERIAL EXAMINED. — ZMTAU Co 34469 (2 colonies), Saint-Leu, Pointe des Châteaux ( 21°09’04.39”S , 55°16’12.47”E ), reef slope, 14-20 m , 10.IV.2008 . — ZM- TAU Co 34430 (3 colonies), Saint-Paul, Cap la Houssaye ( 21°01’02.90”S , 55°14’15.49”E ), reef slope, 7 m , 8.IV.2008 .

May, 1898; B ,

; C ,

; D ,

; E ,

; F ,

caption.paragraph:

May, 1899; B ,

Sinularia numerosa
Tixier- Durivault,1970; D ,

; E ,

n. sp. ; F , G ,
Sinularia tessieri
n. sp. ; F , with extended polyps; G , with retracted polyps.
